related_post.text: ```pyIn [157]: pols = np.zeros((3,3))In [159]: pols[[1,1,1],[2,2,2]]+=1In [160]: polsOut[160]:array([[0. 0. 0.], [0. 0. 1.], [0. 0. 0.]])```Is there a way to having an array of i values and another of j values add 1 to each i,j cell even if they are duplicated? Like in the example above I want the cell to have `3` in it.
